  }

    unset($this->process);
  }
  public function run() {
  }
  public function createInstance() {
    return new taskinstance_@{$name}($this);
  }
  public function isValid() {
    return eval("return ".$this->condition.";");
  }
}

class taskinstance_@{$name} {
  public $formsDone=array();
  public $task;
  public function __construct($task) {
    $this->task = $task;
  }
  public function __destruct() {
    unset($this->task);
  }
  public function formDone($user,$formName) {
    $this->formsDone[$user][]= $formName;
  }
  public function getNextFormName($user) {
    foreach($this->task->forms[$user] as $f) if(!(isset($this->formsDone[$user]) and (array_search($f,$this->formsDone[$user])!==false) )){
      return $f;
    }
    return null;
  }
  public function savePreviousForm($user,$params) {
    if(isset($this->formsDone[$user]) and $pf=$this->formsDone[$user][count($this->formsDone[$user])-1]) {
      $spf=strtolower("save$pf");
      $methods = get_class_methods($this);
      foreach($methods as &$m) $m = strtolower($m);
      if(array_search($spf, $methods)!==false) {
        $this->$spf($user,$params);
      }
    }
  }
